title: Meng Zhoiu Qin Jian Chuanqi
synopsis: On the road to the next era, Professor Su's forcible cracking of the program caused the world of Mengzhou to change. In the disaster, Twist 01 was also seriously injured because of protecting Su Linna. Su Linna quickly cheered up for her father, and with the help of Lele Xiong, she re-entered the dream boat world with Twist 01. On the stage of the Qin era, we began to look for players with missions. (translated from douban)

title: Meng Zhou Xihan Gongzhu
synopsis: Shen Junjun is a well-known talented girl in the school. She is talented, proficient in rhythm, especially good at playing the pipa. However, no one has ever seen her left face, and some even said that she had half a "grim face". One day, she mysteriously disappeared... The Han Dynasty in the world of "Dream Boat" coincided with the grand occasion of Zhaojun going out of the fortress. This princess Zhaojun is savage and wayward and eccentric, but she has always been wearing a veil and never shows her true colors. Who is she? True and false princesses are full of mists. The truth that seemed to be revealed, but turned back and forth. The war is imminent, and the swords are tense. The relationship involves the conflict of interests between the two countries. Can Su Linna unravel the mystery of the princess and resolve the imminent war between the Han and the Huns?(translated from douban)

title: Meng Zhoiu Qin Jian Chuanqi
synopsis: On the road to the next era, Professor Su's forcible cracking of the program caused the world of Mengzhou to change. In the disaster, Twist 01 was also seriously injured because of protecting Su Linna. Su Linna quickly cheered up for her father, and with the help of Lele Xiong, she re-entered the dream boat world with Twist 01. title: Daji Chengzhang Ji season2
synopsis: There are a group of happy little friends living in Taoyuan mainland—who are always naughty and don’t listen to class, but are full of sense of justice at critical moments; the first-class grade seven, but from time to time be confused; the natural beauty Duo Duo, every day Only go out when they are dressed up... Taoyuan Village is their beautiful home, and the small college is a paradise for them to learn. However, three guys who always like to do sabotage followed them, doing everything possible to bully the children, but they made a lot of jokes and made the children gradually increase their awareness of self-protection, and learned a lot of disaster prevention, self-help, and emergency response. method. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 大吉成长记 特别篇

title: Da Yu Zhishui(2019)
synopsis: The animation "Da Yu Controls the Waters" uses the classic Chinese folk tale of the same name as the theme. It tells the story of the ancient hero Dayu who was ordered by Emperor Shun during the flood and led Gengchen, Boyi, Shuhai and others to overcome many difficulties and obstacles. The story of finally calming down the flood and defeating the co-work of the gods of water, at the same time interspersed with the touching love between Dayu and Tu Shan and the ancient tales of the inaccessibility of the three-time family, showing that Dayu has a heart for the world, fears hardships and dangers, and forgets selfishness. the spirit of. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shanggu Chuanshuo Da Yu Zhishui
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Si Lu Chuanqi Dahai Tu
synopsis: This film tells the story of a modern boy Xiaoqi who came to the era of my country's Yuan Dynasty navigator Wang Dayuan because of an unexpected opportunity, and started a fun-filled maritime Silk Road adventure with him. They set off from Quanzhou, went down to the South China Sea, crossed Malacca, crossed the Indian Ocean and the Arabian Sea, and reached the coast of East Africa. They have withstood the test again and again. Xiaoqi witnessed the whole process of Wang Dayuan drawing the most complete nautical chart in the world at that time, and also gained a deep understanding of the Maritime Silk Road(translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhi Shanzhi Dao
synopsis: When the teacher taught the disciples about the difference between the magnitude of goodness, Zishan was puzzled. In the evening, Zishan was arrested by black and white impermanence in his dream. When he judged Zishan and weighed his good and evil, he discovered that there is less good and more evil... After waking up, I understood what is good! Let you understand what is the best way, which has profound educational significance. (translated from douban)

title: Xiaomi De Senlin
synopsis: Few people know this forest. This forest used to be a civilized world. A large amount of civilization was lost under an attack by insects. This attack was quickly calmed down. Few people know what kind of force calmed the turmoil. The forest began to move towards another balance, which lasted for about twelve years. In the most recent time, abnormal phenomena have begun to appear in the forest. Is it another sign of disaster? 　　 During a trip, Xiaomi and his master broke into this forest by mistake. Because of the disappearance of the master, Xiaomi was alone in the forest. After meeting the elderly Hong Jiu, she learned that this is not an ordinary forest, and that there were strange marks on Xiaomi's body, and she was seriously ill. Hong Jiu promised Xiaomi to help him find herbs, and gave Xiaomi to Snow Camel Rice when he left. 　　 Looking for the missing master, the seriously ill self, all kinds of creatures that have never been seen in the forest... Together with rice, Xiaomi and rice began a dangerous journey in this forest...(translated form iqiyi)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao De Gushi
synopsis: "Chinese Zodiac" is a domestic animation produced by Shanghai Fine Arts Film Studio from 1993 to 1995. It has 13 episodes and mainly tells the origin of the Chinese Zodiac. In each episode of the story, there will be an evil monster. Every time a monster is eliminated, an animal will give its life. To commemorate them, the animal becomes the zodiac of the year. The zodiac signs are an important part of Chinese traditional culture. This animation is telling the hero myth story of the zodiac signs. (translated from bilibili)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Gushi

title: Qihuan Long Bao

title: Guandong Sanbao Ji
synopsis: The cartoon "The Three Treasures of Guandong" is a 26-episode cartoon produced by CCTV in 1997. The cartoon tells about: At the foot of the lush Changbai Mountain, there is a beautiful and rich village, that is, the famous Sanbao Village. So it is called Sanbao Village because there are ginseng dolls, small deer plums, sable small and their friends, as well as the fox immortal and the leopard immortal. (translated from letv)

title: Na Sa Er Ding
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Na Sa Er Ding Dong Youji
synopsis: Nasardin, who finally gathered seven pieces of Yugui, successfully summoned the Jasper Dragon Art and completely dispelled the Raksha demons who had invaded the desert king Kum. Tokrak exhausted the last trace of life force and turned into a huge Populus euphratica tree, with its roots firmly fixed the top of the empty sky that was about to collapse, and made it safely land on the Kunlun Mountain Tianchi. Although the people who lost Toklak are distraught, Toklak's will will continue to be passed on by them. On the other side, Orange Moon seemed to have a new move.(translated from douban)

title: Qixing Chuanqi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Qijiguang
synopsis: The 26-episode animated series "Qi Jiguang" produced by Beijing TV station Kaku Children's TV is about the Qi's army led by Qi Jiguang during the Jiajing period of the Ming Dynasty. Hero story. Qi Jiguang's legendary journey from a passionate young man with ideals and ambitions to a loyal and loyal national hero is not only his personal success, but also an expression of the courage and strength of the Chinese nation to fight abroad. In this film, we focus on the portrayal of "people". Every character that appears on the screen has rich emotions and unique personalities, making Qi Jiajun not only a representative of iron and blood, but also a warm side. The flesh and blood Qi family army traveled through 800 years of time and space before the audience. (translated from douban)

title: Luo Baobei
synopsis: "Luo Baby" is a cartoon focused on preschool parent-child appreciation. The protagonist of the story, Luo Baby, is a sunny and lively seven-year-old Chinese girl who lives in the same community with her parents and grandparents. Each episode is a true display of the interesting and fun stories that happened in life of Luo Bao, family, and friends. Baby Luo is full of curiosity and love for everything that happens in the world around him: three generations of life in the same house, the company of friends and partners...When there are some small situations in life, Baby Luo can always be in the child's unlimited imagination world , Find a solution. Baby Luo is like every real child in our lives, always growing up in the process of facing and solving problems, to understand and love the world more. With the story of Luo Baobao, let us accompany our children to grow up happily together. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Luo Baobei season2
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Luo Baobei season3

title: Luo Baobei Xilie Zhi Qi Qu Baodian Julebu
synopsis: The film has created a typical Chinese-style family, and through the "Fun Club" they opened, it epitomizes the current social situation and development. The subject matter of the film comes from reality, but transcends reality. The troubles of life and daily trivial matters are interpreted here, and it has become a haven for contemporary people to release their spiritual pressure and find their innocent self. There are lively characters, moving stories, sweet music, interactive communication... (translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 洛宝贝系列之奇趣宝典俱乐部

title: Luo Baobei Ai Kexue
synopsis: This film is a TV animation series with Luo Baby as the protagonist and introducing world-renowned scientists and scientific knowledge as the main context. It embodies the unity of knowledge, interest, appreciation and entertainment. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Luo Baobei Xilie Zhi Qi Qu Baobei Aixin Xiao Juchang
synopsis: The school carried out activities to promote traditional Chinese culture. Under the initiative of Luo Baobao, the students formed a small caring theater and performed lively and interesting stage plays. Representative love story. There are great love for the country and the people, such as Dayu governing the water, Ban Chao throwing pens to join the Rong, etc.; there are touching family affections such as Meng Mu's three migrations, Tanzi deer milk and relatives; there is the touching friendship between the giant Xun who does not abandon his friend and the only child, and Guan Zhongbao's uncle; The love chapter of Tuo's healing and saving lives by Ze Limin. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 洛宝贝系列之奇趣宝贝爱心小剧场

title: Maitian Shen Shu
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Luo Baobei Ting Gushi
synopsis: "Luo Baby Listening to Stories" is an animation program with strong sustainability, extensive content, clear main line and flexible and changeable. It is divided into two parts, "Dragon Horse Magic Lamp" and "Dahua Idioms". "The Magic Lamp of Dragon Horse" mainly talks about Chinese-born men who immigrated to Canada when they were young, but their lives were not happy, their parents were divorced and the family broke up, and they always encountered problems in school. During a visit to an exhibition of Chinese cultural relics, the man was mistaken as a suspect of stealing national treasures. The depressed man decided to run away from home. On the way, he ran into the ancestor of the gods and gave him a magic lantern. The man is determined to find his innocence with the help of the magic lamp. He walked into the space-time tunnel and came to ancient China three thousand years ago. Discovered that the space demon steals the emerald in an attempt to defeat the big conspiracy of mankind to occupy the earth. The man stepped forward and did not hesitate to participate in the battle to defend the earth... "Dahua Idioms" is a cultural program that incorporates idioms' origins, historical allusions and objective insights. The whole story is a cartoon version of Mr. Tian Lianyuan telling a story to Baby Luo and his friends. It highlights the combination of knowledge, entertainment, fun and appreciation, and it is entertaining and entertaining.(translated from tenceng)

title: Qi Qu Meng Gong Fang
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Tudou Xia
synopsis: Tudou has a lazy personality, and from time to time he will be stunned, be cute, play lowly, and have two major hobbies in his life-eating and sleeping. According to the rules of Tudou Village, every member must go out to practice when they reach a certain age, but Tudou hasn't left. Dad Tudou had no choice but to tie him to a giant vole while riding the potato while he was asleep. When Tudou woke up, he was already in a bustling city. 　　 Tudou accidentally picked up the supreme artifact "Kirin Chopsticks", and was chased by various schools, and hid in the No.7 kitchen panicked. Tudou also inadvertently summoned the Wuhun "Millennium Old Ginseng" and was forced to become his apprentice, reluctantly taking on the task of restoring peace in the rivers and lakes. On the other hand, the news that Kirin chopsticks were hidden in Kitchen No. 7 spread wildly, attracting all kinds of weird people from the rivers and lakes to snatch it, and the wonderful and hilarious story kicked off...(translated form douban)

title: Yang Jia Jiang Zhi Jin Shatan
synopsis: The Yang family’s Golden Sand Beach is about in Golden Sand Beach, Da Lang accidentally drank poisonous alcohol, Er Lang died for the Eight Kings, Saburo was hit into the mud by Ma, Qi Lang was shot to death by Pan Renmei, shot a hundred times and three arrows, there were 70 Two arrows hit the chest... The Yang Family will be a series of legends of heroes, widely circulated in the Chinese folk in the form of romance, storytelling, and drama. It describes some characters and events in the early Northern Song Dynasty, and tells the moving deeds of the four generations of the Yang family defending northern Xinjiang and serving the country with loyalty.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Yang Jia Jiang Zhi Pan Yang An
synopsis: During the trial, several witnesses confessed Pan Renmei's numerous guilt, but Pan Renmei pleaded not guilty. Kou Zhun had to go to the frontier to collect evidence, and after returning to Beijing, he worked with the Eight Sage Kings to make a confession to the traitor Pan Renmei. Seeing that the situation has gone to the palace, Zheng Gong empress pleads for her father. Taizong is soft-hearted and exiles Pan Renmei to the border. During the escort, Liu Lang led the widow of the Yang family to rob Dao, and finally Pan Renmei rectified the law. The treacherous minister just broke the law, and the frontier sue the military for emergency. Taijun She took the initiative to ask Ying to lead the widow of the Yang family to the north of Saibei, but unexpectedly Pengcheng was trapped. Kou Zhun, Yang Liulang, and the Eight Sage Kings went to the rescue. On the march, they subdued the generals Meng Liang and Jiao Zan, and Meng Liang burned and rescued Taijun She.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Yang Jia Jiang Zhi Zhan Pengcheng
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Hongse Chuanqi
synopsis: The Red Legend is based on ten real revolutionary stories including "The Blacksmith's Son", "Dragon Boat Drums", "Little Iron Head Striking the Horse", "Stone Baby" and other ten real revolutionary stories, adding many modern drama elements. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shanmao He Ji Mi
synopsis: The large-scale original animated feature film "Lynx and Jimmy" was broadcast on CCTV Children's Channel. This is another animation masterpiece released by Bobcat Cartoon at the New York International Independent Film and Television Festival in the United States after it won the "Best Animation Film Award" with "The Adventures of Lynx Jimmy". The broadcast of "Lynx and Jimmy" changed the style of Bobcat cartoons that only produced refined short films, and entered the era of refined feature films. The film shows the audience a personal life truth in a witty and humorous way, which can be described as a real "small story, great wisdom". The successive broadcasting of two large-scale animated feature films laid a solid foundation for "Lynx Jimmy" to become a century-old boutique animation brand.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Shanmao Ji Mi Zhi Zimu Shijie Lixian Ji
synopsis: An accidental magic accident caused the Bobcats, Jimmy and their classmates and teachers of the magic school to be involved in a wonderful world in this world. As magic can create the magic of different worlds, everyone plays the role of ancient and modern Chinese and foreign. Various characters of, launched an endless battle. There are "Lord of the Rings"-style knight legends; there are martial arts enmities full of Chinese characteristics; there are stories of police and bandits fighting wits and courage; there are even new-style wars in the future. Letters! What role do the letters play? Please see "The Adventures of Lynx Jimi Alphabet World"! (translated from sogou)

details.Japanese: 山猫吉咪之字母世界历险记

title: Shanmao He Ji Mi Zhi Kuaile Pian
synopsis: Lynx and Jimmy often encounter the cunning and insidious Coulee and Sinke because of events of one kind or another. Coulee racked their brains, or framed or attacked Lynx cat and Jimmy, but they were both caught by the clever Bobcat and Jimmy. Resolve one by one. Each story becomes interesting independently, but all themes show that goodness and beauty defeat evil and conspiracy. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shanmao He Ji Mi Zhi Jianianhua
synopsis: The story takes place in a beautiful and free dream forest. Everyone lives happily together. In the forest, the little bully Coulee is often jealous of the friendship between Lynx and Jimi, and he keeps designing and teasing the Lynx together with the mischievous Xinke, but the endless spooky ideas are resolved by Lynx and Jimi one by one. Coulee and Xinke are instead. There were also many jokes. In the laughter, everyone learned understanding and tolerance, learned unity and mutual assistance, and learned justice and courage.(translated from youku)

title: Shanmao He Ji Mi Zhi Quanjia Le
synopsis: The story of "Lynx and Jimmy's Family Fun" takes place in a mysterious dream forest. The clever and brave Lynx, the quirky Jimmy, the domineering and simple Coulee, and the timid and witty Cink became good friends. However, Coulee and Xinke often cause a lot of misfortunes for one reason or another. Lynx and Jimmy make a tricky plan, which not only makes Coulee and Xinke eat their own evil results, creates a lot of joy for the forest, but also makes Coulee He and Xinke slowly learned to be considerate of others and became good partners with other children in the forest. (translated from youku)

title: BeyRaiderz: Shogun
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
background: In an unknown land, six guardian beasts provide protection and help cities to thrive through battles called BeyRaiderz. An unknown evil arises to take on the six guardian figures, forcing the six to unite. At the end of the battle the land is protected, but the guardians fall into a slumber. This allows many natural disasters to occur, causing the land to lose its beauty and the people to forget about BeyRaiderz battles. As the six guardian beasts begin to awaken, they call on six BeyWarriors from other lands. The six BeyWarriors are each given BeyRaiderz and charged with going from coliseum arena to coliseum arena to battle. Battling enough times will allow the spirits to reawaken, and it can't happen soon enough as the same darkness that caused them to unite is reawakening and threatens to destroy the world once more.

title: Shanmao Ji Mi Zhi Yijia Qin
synopsis: This film tells the story of five children, Lynx, Jimmy, Coulee, Cinke, and Fox. Coulee is domineering and Xinke is greedy, and the two often team up to bully other children. Lynx, Jimmy, and Fox deal with Coulee and Xinke, making Coulee and Xinke make a lot of jokes, and teach them to respect others, respect the old and love the young. (translated from youku)

title: Shanmao He Ji Mi Zhi Mohuan Pintu
synopsis: In order to realize the magic puzzle and dominate Wanhua Island, Coulee snatches Jimmy from the Bobcat. In order to rescue Jimmy, and for the residents of Wanhua Island to live happily, the justice envoy Bobcat bravely stood up! (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 山猫和吉咪之魔幻拼图

title: Shanmao He Ji Mi Zhi Pintu Mima
synopsis: In order to stop Coulee's ambitions and protect Wanhua Island and Jimmy's sister, the Bobcats bravely went into battle. Many interesting things happened on Wanhua Island. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 山猫和吉咪之拼图密码

title: Da Xia Shanmao He Ji Mi
synopsis: The evil overlord has come back, Wanhua Island is facing the biggest crisis, and the Bobcat identity has been revealed. How to choose between friendship and family affection? Gulischen is indifferent to the enemy and Jimmy the Lynx is attacked. At the critical moment, the Lynx turned into the Lynx Man, and he was born, fighting against the enemy again and again to defend his homeland. (translated from youku)

title: Da Xia Shanmao He Ji Mi season2
synopsis: Wanhua Island is facing the biggest crisis. The Bobcat's identity is revealed, Gulisin defeats the enemy, and Jimmy the Lynx is attacked. At the critical moment, the Lynx became the Lynx Man, and fought the enemy to the death again and again, vowing to defend his homeland. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 大侠山猫和吉咪 第二季

title: Di Di Bang Bang Zongdongyuan
synopsis: In the bizarre and beautiful happy and beautiful village, there are five children with good personalities, Didi, Bangbang, brother, Noisy, Sweet, they form a small team headed by Didi and Bangbang who love to help others . However, they tend to make things worse when they help others. They gradually master the common sense and skills of life through various things, and understand the true meaning of friendship and the power of unity and cooperation. (translated from tenceng)

title: Budda
synopsis: In ancient India, the lives of many people are plagued by famine, drought, war and constant injustices in the Indian caste system. The intertwining many unhappy souls are drawn together by the birth of the young prince Siddhartha, who embarks on a spiritual journey, becomes Gotama Buddha, "the enlightened one", and tries to bring spiritual rebirth to the people in this desperate age.

title: Shenqi Xiaozi-Mai Ge Yu Xiao Buji
synopsis: Phuket went on an adventure with Banana in Waterwheel Town and found the relic left by the ancient Abu heroes. There was a stamp and a diary in the relic. Phuket and Banana entered the diary together with the stamps. Due to the curiosity of Phuket, the diary Inside, he took out the martial arts secrets of Abu Hero. Banana and the diary mysteriously disappeared. So Buji decided to convert the locomotive house into a flying house, went out to search for bananas, and vowed to become a direct disciple of Abu Hero, since then. Righteousness... (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 神奇小子-麦歌与小布吉

title: Xing Xueyuan
synopsis: The magic academy standing in the middle of the Kingdom of Rila is the dream place of all children, and the story takes place in this magical academy. After Morikawa's daughter Mei Xing entered the Magic Academy, she met Sakura, Mei Shuo, Ming Jie, Hao Nan, etc., and they became good friends to study and live together. Suddenly one day, the heart stone in the academy disappeared with Meixing's father, Grand Mage Morikawa. In order to find the heart stone and return his father's innocence, Meixing and her partners embarked on the path of searching. (translated from douban)

title: Xing Xueyuan 2 Zhi Yue Ling Shou Huan
synopsis: "Star Academy II: Moon Spirit Band" is a 26-episode magical and adventure magical girl animation series launched by Hangzhou Meisheng Animation Co., Ltd. It mainly tells the story of two magical girls, Satsuki and Philo, who entered a different world and fought against the dark forces in order to save their companion Meixing. In another world, Xiaoyue and her friends embarked on a fantasy journey of collecting moon spirit bracelets.(translated from douban)

title: Xing Xueyuan 3 Zhi Pan Duo La Mijing
synopsis: Season 3: Philo and his partners have grown into excellent magicians through their studies at the Star Academy, and are about to face graduation examinations. However, at this time, Philo was accidentally involved in the disappearance of the magic card wizard. At the same time, King Rila suddenly became seriously ill, Pandora's Magic Card was all the rage, and the Minister of the Kingdom mysteriously disappeared. Behind all the events there seemed to be a shocking secret from ten years ago. In order to find out the truth, Philo and his partners joined Pandora's Fantasy Society and became a member of the Aurora Group. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Zhonghua Xiao Yue Yun
synopsis: It tells the story of the eldest son of the national hero Yue Fei in the Song Dynasty, Yue Yun and his five friends, Lin Mei, Guan Ling, Niu Tong, and Han Yanzhi, in order to defend justice, heroically breaking the process of Qin Hui and his men's shocking conspiracy. Through the adventures of Yue Yun and his friends, the film has portrayed characters such as Yue Yun, Lin Mei, Guan Ling, Niu Tong, and Han Yanzhi with positive personalities such as justice, bravery, tenacity, sacrifice, etc., to create a correct outlook on life for young people. The world outlook and outlook on honor and disgrace have laid a solid foundation... (translated from youku)

title: Yanwei Xia
synopsis: Youth dreams are in the distance, brave teenagers are on the road, come on, swallowtail man, set sail and embrace the light of love..." In 2010, a pair of 12-year-old twin siblings Lei Lei and Xin Xin accidentally activated the bottom of the Kaiyuan Temple twin towers The biological modification system in the spacecraft, after genetic modification of the body, becomes a swallowtail man with superpowers. The iron arrow from planet X tries to destroy humans and occupy the earth. In order to prevent the iron arrow, Lei Lei and Xin Xin travel back through time and space. In the Song Dynasty, aboard the "Erythronium" merchant ship, embarked on a journey to save the earth! A battle between justice and evil began... (translated from baidu baike)

title: Minjian Gui Shu
synopsis: Zhang Xin is an unknown ordinary illustrator. One day, a mysterious ID "Folk Ghost" found him and began to provide him with a large number of wonderful stories. Zhang Xin started to create comic stories based on these stories, and gradually became a famous cartoonist in China. He still doesn’t know who is behind this mysterious ID and why he was found. Everything is done in folk ghosts. (translated from gimy)

title: Wo Shi Bin Guo
synopsis: A group of simple and kind residents live in a magical city called Dream Grid. Everyone realizes their wishes with the help of the magician Bin Guo, but every time after the wishes are realized, the real challenge begins. Represented by Umbrella Chi, Potato, Fun Fruit, and Fun Ke, they interpret all the troubles they have experienced in their growth, and inherit the helpful spirit of the magician family's trainee magician-Bin Guo, using various magic to help everyone eliminate their troubles and realize their wishes. Such as "back in time" magic, "power enhancement" magic, "everyone is your friend" magic and so on. Through various events and wonderful magic, Binguo and the protagonist work together to overcome their shortcomings, adhere to their own advantages, and finally overcome all difficulties, and let the protagonist discover his true strength! Post-note: For the first 52 episodes of cartoons, we chose "Growth Troubles" as the serial element of the entire series to unfold each wonderful story. Our cartoons do not tell you "a truth", nor do they just tell you "dreams can be realized by magic", but "make you discover your own power"! After watching "I Am Binguo", let all the audience believe that "As long as you persist and work hard, you can create miracles by yourself"!(translated from tenceng)

title: Yu Qilin Gushi Hui Zhi Jingdian Gushi Zongdongyuan
synopsis: Jade Kylin comes from a mysterious world. It is lively and cute, optimistic and mischievous, and has some magical little powers. Yuqilin is keen to listen to or tell various stories, learn about all kinds of novel and unique things, and make new friends. Tell your favorite Chinese classic fairy tales, myths and legends, folk tales, classic stories, idiom stories with your friends... For more exciting videos, please follow CNTV Animation Channel! (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 玉麒麟故事会之经典故事总动员

title: Dajiao Niu Meng Gongchang 2
synopsis: After the original guardian of Niu Dadu retired, he entrusted Grandpa Niu to hand over a magic weapon, the foolish gourd, to a brave who could become the new guardian of Niu Dadu. As a result, Big Horn Niu was selected. Confused Gourd has the ability to reward good Gourd Beans to people who are upright and worthy of praise, and use bad Gourd Beans to punish those who make mistakes and bad intentions. The badass bat demon on Moonback Mountain was jealous of the big horn bull's good reputation, and tried his best to make the big horn bull ugly, and exhausted his bad ideas to tease and frame the big horn bull. But with the help of the confused gourd and his friends, Bighorn Bull smashed the bat demon's conspiracy time and time again, making the bat devil suffer for the bad things he did. (translated from tenceng)

title: Xingji Jiazu Zhi Anquan Shaonian Tuan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 星际家族之安全少年团

title: Tian You Fan Tong
synopsis: Recruiting talents in the fairy world, Laojun Taishang used the establishment of an experimental class for immortality to recruit five element prodigies-Xiaodian, Wuli, Tudou, Amo, and Bulu. The five-person gods of the heavens, woods, waters, fires and earth, descended and reincarnated in the eighth generation of possessions. Before they were called to the heavens, the five knew nothing about it, and the story unfolded. The five people are in the heaven, and they gradually realize their own abilities and fight against the evil forces. At the same time, the five people have constant friction in their lives due to their different personalities, but they can finally work together, continue to learn, and constantly challenge themselves. In the mythical color of happiness, Interpret the doubts of life and understand the truth of life. (translated from douban)

title: Chao Neng Yongshi
synopsis: With the wanton demand and destruction of natural resources by mankind, the earth's self-purification ability has gradually weakened, and it can no longer withstand human pollution. At this time, the terrifying source of pollution became stronger and stronger, and eventually mutated into a monster that threatened the earth's environment. At the moment when human children are threatened by the lives of contaminated monsters, the righteous and brave super warriors are summoned to wake up and step forward to rescue the human children. Since then, the super warrior has relied on his own wit and bravery to break through the pollution aliens one by one and help restore the beautiful home of the earth.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Da Caoyuan Shang De Xiao Laoshu
synopsis: There are a group of lively and cute little mice on the prairie. They are the little country mouse Treviso, its parents Mr. Di and Mrs. Di, younger sister Beatty, and Treviso's cousin, the city little mouse Os Valley. They live together industriously and bravely, living in harmony with the rabbit Blauson, the duck Flip, and the frog Jeremiah, and together they fight against the intrusion of the fat cat Bisie and the weasel Sweeney.
background: aired in 1996. This anime won The 4th National Children’s TV "Golden Boy Award" and 1998 "China TV Golden Eagle Award"

title: Baxianguohai
synopsis: There are eight gods in ancient mythology: Tieguai Li, Han Zhongli, Zhang Guolao, Lan Caihe, Lu Dongbin, Han Xiangzi, He Xiangu, and Cao Guojie. They are also called the Eight Immortals. These eight gods each experienced hardships and were promoted to the gods. When they went to the appointment, they met the sea blocking the way, and the eight gods each showed their abilities to cross the sea. (translated from douban)

title: Baxianguohai (2019)
synopsis: The animation "Eight Immortals Crossing the Sea" is the second batch of the key animation project of the "Chinese Classic Folktale Animation Creation Project" in 2018 by the Central Propaganda Department and the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television. It has 10 episodes and a total of 180 minutes. It is produced by Hunan Golden Eagle Cartoon. The "Eight Immortals Crossing the Sea" series of cartoons are adapted from the Chinese folk legends of the Eight Immortals, with the traditional Chinese Taoist mythology system as the main worldview background, relying on the main story lines in the "Journey to the East" and other related novels, and combining the current spirit of hard work Innovate and integrate the more classic and characteristic monster images in ancient books such as "Shanhai Jing", "Zibuyu", "Shuowen Jiezi", "Youyang Miscellaneous Cu", "Yuewei Caotang Notes" and other ancient books, and set it as The new "burning direction" level. The entire series starts from the characters themselves, allowing the audience to see how the Eight Immortals, who were ordinary people at first, used their own efforts and hard work to stick to their beliefs in life, uphold the traditional virtues while solving problems with wisdom.(translated fom douban)

title: Women De Jiayuan
synopsis: 52 episodes of domestically produced cartoons show the power of the collective with the experience of a group of little ants. Characters: Three little male red ants live with this grandma, two little female white ants live with Dr. Bai (an old grandfather), and a big man (translated from douban)

title: Kaixin Guo(2017)
synopsis: "Pistachio" is a series of cartoons jointly produced by its cartoon and CCTV. The story takes place in an ordinary courtyard house in Happy Hutong in Beijing, where three cousins live here, "Kai Kai, Xin Xin, Guo Guo". They are as innocent and kind as most children, and they are full of curiosity about the world. But their curiosity and energy are a little bit stronger than others! It is this kind of "exuberance" that makes them love to play, make trouble, and make trouble. In the funny stories one after another, the three cousins continue to bravely face and correct their mistakes as they grow up, happily harvesting happy fruits in life. (translated from tenceng)

title: A Ben Mao
synopsis: "Aben Cat" tells a series of interesting stories between the theft of a Benmao and his neighbors and friends who lived in a town surrounded by mountains and rivers. The beautiful Jiaojiao wants to lose weight. Aunt Pig is going out and she doesn’t worry that Little Pig will be home alone. Master Yuankong, who has qigong power, can do things with her mind. The silly big bear wins the prize accidentally, but the prize is one. Only the very melancholic gorilla from Africa-the whole series of stories are magical and sci-fi. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiaobudian
synopsis: This work tells the daily story between the protagonist Xiao Budian and the puppy Mao Mao. (translated from youku)

title: Ling Jue Xiao Heshang
synopsis: This film tells the story of wisdom and emptiness in the Lingjue Temple on the top of the incense burner. Through the anecdotes in their lives, people can understand the way of life, love life, be kind to others, and spend every life in their lives with a humorous attitude one day. (translated from youku)

title: Yi Fenzhong Xiao Zhentan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Chong Chong
synopsis: Chongchong is a four-year-old Chinese boy. His little head is always full of cute and strange ideas. He often unexpectedly asks some tricky questions that are difficult for adults to answer. He often makes many small questions in daily life. The situation makes adults dumbfounded, and it also brings out a lot of little fun in life. Chong Chong is father’s pistachio, mother’s good baby, kindergarten aunt’s little mischief, and a good partner for children. He lives happily in a joyous world, earnestly discovering and creating a beautiful world. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xiao Taiji
synopsis: One day, a strange big bird flew to the middle of the school’s playground. At this time, the elementary student Dalong did not attend the class seriously. The teacher asked him to tell the story of Pangu Kaitian that Pangu is an ancient plate. After class, Dalong saw it. Everyone was catching the big bird, and the big dragon rescued the big bird. At this time, the big bird became a girl. The girl said she was called "Jingwei". (translated from baidu baike)

title: Feitian Xiao Hou Wang
synopsis: A long time ago, people lived with animals and demons, forming a very interesting world. The little monkey, the protagonist of our cartoon, lives in such a world. At the beginning of the story, he was just an innocent little monkey who wanted to fly into the sky. In his eyes, all people and elves are good friends, and everyone should share happiness and happiness equally. Therefore, in later days, whenever he encountered people and things that interfered with world peace and tranquility, he would not hesitate to stand up for justice and fight with all his strength. That is to say, in this struggle, he didn't know. Unconsciously grow into a hero. (translated from douban)

title: Touming Dun
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Taikong Tejing
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Wan Wan Qian Qian Weisheme

title: Mei Hou Wang (1995)
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Shenlong Weishi
synopsis: In the mid and late 1990s, a full 3D animation series produced by the animation department of CCTV, the broadcast platform was "Animation City". The plot tells: In the future world, human beings are making every effort to build their own homes. In the Earth Defense and Guardianship Base, there are two intelligent people doing their duty to defend the peace of the earth. They are Long Zhi and Long Hui. The invaders from Planet S, the Scarlet Witch, brought her entourage, Robert, to gather in the Devil’s Castle. The four King Kong from aliens accompanied them. They relied on cutting-edge technology to look forward to the ancient civilizations of the earth. Long Zhihe Long Hui launched a desperate struggle with them... (translated from douban)

title: Konglong Shijie
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Konglong Shijie(2019)
synopsis: Have you ever imagined the experience of traveling back to the age of dinosaurs? You chase me when the dinosaurs prey, and the grand scene when the volcano erupts can be seen in "Dinosaur World"! The ancient dinosaur picture scroll prepared for you, all the dinosaurs you know and like are here! (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ju Ping Jiejie Jiang Gushi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Jingbao Zhanshi
synopsis: Wooden top king-Yun Xiaohu is a cheerful, lively, enthusiastic and competitive elementary school student. He has always been obsessed with top competitions and has repeatedly failed. He never knew that the grandfather dressed as an old farmer was one of the legendary seven sacred beast gyro masters. In addition to the roaring tiger, the chasing leopard and the King Kong armor have become treachery and have ambitions. To grab the target. (translated from douban)

title: Shuimu Wawa Shi Wan Ge Weisheme
synopsis: The Mizuki doll "One Hundred Thousand Whys" series uses popular science knowledge as the main material and uses cartoon characters as the protagonist to tell various common questions and answers in daily life with the help of short stories. Young children aged 3-7 can easily understand and master the knowledge of popular science while watching short stories, learning popular science knowledge that parents have no time to teach or even parents can’t answer. (translated from baidu)

details.Japanese: 水木娃娃十万个为什么

title: Jingling Shiji
synopsis: For a long time, the elven kingdom has been guarding the gem of the source of life that is related to the survival of mankind. However, the evil dark elves coveted the powerful power of gems. They summoned terrible demons and occupied the kingdom of elves. Just as the gems were about to fall into the hands of thieves, the brave and tenacious Elf Prince Kaka (voiced by Chu Jun) brought Gems came to the world with the help of Princess Noya of the Elf Kingdom (voiced by Chu Jun), and met the stationery king Charlie (voiced by Jackie Chan) and toy leader Kaida (voiced by Li Yong) through misplay. 　　 There are often fierce conflicts between the stationery led by Charlie and the toy army led by Yukaida, but their wish is the same, that is, they hope their little master can grow up healthy and happy. The arrival of Kaka allowed Charlie and Al Qaeda to shoulder the arduous task of saving the planet and defending peace. (translated from douban)

title: Mo Mo
synopsis: In an overhead future world where people's hearts are getting colder and colder, everyone misses the warm hearts of the past while throwing away their warm hearts. Cities were divided into many parts in the past, and people in different cities have different moral characteristics. However, in the overhead future world, all cities are getting closer and closer, and people are like a piece of cold steel. Because of Momo's arrival, people gradually recovered the self that was covered by layers of masks. (translated from douban)

title: Xingji Biaoche Wang
synopsis: The story takes place in the future cosmic space, and space transportation is already very developed. Tais is the president of the "Titan" Aerospace Automobile Group on the "Tektronix Satellite", the tenth generation heir of the Titan family, and a kind-looking but ruthless careerist. He regards competitors in the same industry as thorns and thorns. His ultimate goal is to make his company dominate the entire universe automobile market and make huge profits. To this end, Tas is behind the scenes manipulating a caravan of brakes. 　　 Ten years ago, on the planet Titan, the young giant of the interstellar racing industry commissioned the famous scientist Dr. Renault to develop two advanced racing cars. With the car that he just built, Tays showed his ferocity. He threatened to destroy all his competitors by any means. Dr. Renault is deeply disturbed. If all the cutting-edge technology is handed over to Tais, it will bring unpredictable suffering to the stars. Dr. Renault quietly boarded the train returning to the Yellow River planet. The interstellar train was running at high speed and suddenly broke down inexplicably. Dr. Renault was killed and disappeared. 　　 Ten years later, on the Yellow River satellite, Renault’s son, Arley, has grown into a kind-hearted teenager with the potential for racing genius. Because of the nightmare ten years ago, Grandpa refused to let him participate in the car racing. But he wanted to play racing, and finally he became the king of wild cars. After experiencing thrilling interstellar racing competitions, he became a professional driver and represented the stars in the interstellar league. In order to honor the constellations and expose the conspiracy of Taisi, Alle determined to challenge Taisi's undefeated mythical youth team with his partners in the league. In the final, Aley used the ultimate secret to comprehend the realm of the unity of man and vehicle, and took the lead in crossing the finish line, winning the championship and becoming the new star car king. And Renault also rushed out of Thas's imprisonment, announced the truth, and shattered Thas's conspiracy. 　　 The film uses science fiction techniques and future life as the background. Through competitions between teams, it is actually a contest between justice and evil, kindness and conspiracy, promoting justice, hard work and team spirit.(translated from douban)

title: Na Zha Chuanqi
synopsis: Nezha (voiced by Hao Youyue) has not been born yet, and has been repeatedly victimized by the evil demon Shiji (voiced by Ma Xiaoling). Shiji lurked for thousands of years, and she helped the brutal King Zhou conquer the world, looking for an opportunity to defeat the righteous force. Nezha has been infinitely powerful since he was born, and he was born with magical powers. Therefore, Nuwa chose him as the incarnation of justice to contend with evil forces and save the world. So Nezha, with the help of Nuwa, Taiyi, and Xiaolongnv, Xiaozhuxiong, Lei Zhenzi and other partners, launched a thrilling struggle with the evil forces on the side of Shiji. Nezha has slowly honed and grown into a brave and strong little hero in the course of difficulties.(translated from douban)

title: Shaonian Direnjie
synopsis: Di Renjie was born in a family of officials in the Tang Dynasty. Soon after he was born, his grandfather Shang Shu Zuo Cheng Di Xiaoxu, and his father Kui Governor Shi Di Zhixun were framed for rebellion, murdered by the court, and his family was stolen. The little Di Renjie was adopted by his uncle Shangguanyi who was an official in the court. Since childhood, Di Renjie and his cousin Shangguan Wan'er followed his uncle to investigate various cases. They were touched by ears and eyes, and he began his life-long legendary career. (translated from douban)

title: Xing Mao Da Juchang Zhihou Yi She Ri
synopsis: In the ancient times when the little star cat lived, there were ten suns in the sky. The crops were burnt, the land dried up, and the heat was too hot. The people of Li people were miserable. The marksman Houyi couldn't bear to see the people suffer. With the help of the little star cat and the fairy, he shot down nine suns in a row to save the people from fire and water. Since then, the climate is suitable, the people live and work in peace, and everything can grow. The fairy took the jade rabbit to the heaven because she took the elixir bestowed by the Queen Mother of the West.(translated from qiiyi)

details.Japanese: 星猫大剧场之后羿射日

title: Xiaoyuan San Jianke
synopsis: Through the mode of "Children Save the Big World", the cartoon tells about the super cool youth group "Three Musketeers on Campus" ("Supernatural Boy" Yang Ge, "Smart Girl" Bai Xue and "Computer Genius" Zhang Xiaokai) A sci-fi detective story about exploring mysterious events on campus and around the world (translated from douban)

title: Sela Yingyu Leyuan
synopsis: Salad English Paradise: The story takes place in a modern city where people and animals get along friendly. There is exactly the same scene as our real life in that world. All the stories that happened revolve around the scenes of our daily lives. Including taxis, restaurants, family chat, hospitals, shops, etc. There is also poor Mr. B, always a hapless guy, trapped on the island for many days, every time his efforts to survive always fail. There is also a frog who wants to get a new insect-catching weapon, a cunning businessman (translated from baidu)

title: Huanbao Xiao Weishi
synopsis: The story tells the protagonist Oliniu, Dirui Sheep and their friends in the cultural palace in the forest in many interesting activities, and they have a strong interest in art. Whether it is photography, music, or painting. (translated form bilibili)

title: Yue Ce Yue Kaixin
synopsis: "The more the strategy, the happier" is one of the most popular entertainment talk shows on Hunan Satellite TV. It is co-hosted by Wang Han and others. The whole program is divided into four units: foreplay, more and more fun, song and dance show, and guests. Select popular elements, topical topics, invite some well-known artists, industry figures with special identities, and some ordinary people to participate in the program, and combine them into a scene through various forms such as film editing, dialect jokes, skits, interviews, and music interpretation. Frequent jokes()translated from baidu

title: Dongbei Yijia Ren
synopsis: The story takes place in a medium-sized industrial city in Northeast China. It revolves around the work and life of a family of seven, three generations old and young.(translated from douban)

title: Da Zuiba Du Du
synopsis: The play is based on a five-year-old innocent kindergarten child with a big mouth muttering as the main character. He is “extremely smart”, full of fantasy, and surprisingly speaking. In the eyes of ordinary people, things that seem ordinary, he can ask you unexpected questions, and at the same time make you laugh. In the kindergarten, there is a little adult who is diligent and inquisitive and has an IQ beyond ordinary children. He has good academic performance, is smart and arrogant. He is loved by teachers and classmates. In addition, Xiaoen, Ayu, Awei, When these innocent, kind, courageous, and righteous children gather together, a series of childish and wonderful stories are staged.(translated from youku)

title: Mofa Zhu Li Ye
synopsis: "Magic Pig Liye" is the second giant domestic original cartoon after "Big Mouth Toot". The story inherits the lively, naughty, witty and whimsical characteristics of "Big Mouth Toot", and adds exciting magic. The story, with the brand-new image of "Magic Pig Liye", revolves around the lively and interesting stories between the simple and honest, but clever little pig Liye and its human friends, with childhood, innocence, Childishness is the main line, and it looks like a little story that cannot be laughed or crying. In fact, it contains a wealth of daily life knowledge, popular science, and science fiction. It not only improves children's thinking ability, but also learns knowledge to develop intelligence and entertaining the goal of. (translated from pptv)

title: Kongxiaoru
synopsis: In a small town in ancient China, there lived a group of simple and kind people. Kong Xiaoru is an orphan in the town, and he lives with the puppy Pudding. 　　Although the people in the town are very poor, they are strong and optimistic and have a strong sense of justice. Kong Xiaoru often helps the villagers come up with ideas. In the town, there is a rich man who loves petty and cheapness and is stingy---Master Om and his fierce wife Magu. They often cheat the villagers, so the villagers are extremely disgusted with and hate the Om family. With wit and bravery, Kong Xiaoru and other villagers repeatedly undermined Master Om’s conspiracy and tricks, making Master Om self-defeating everywhere. (translated from douban)

title: Xiaolong Qiu Qiu
synopsis: The film sets the background in ancient China, and the environmental scenes and characters are full of Chinese flavor. The screens are well-made, the characters are cute, and the dubbing emotions are rich, creating a full and three-dimensional animated image with different characters. The story is lively and interesting, full of Chinese wisdom and humor.(translated from douban)

title: Pao Paobing
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
